text: the more I travel the more obvious it
becomes for which countries I like more
and which countries I don't have the
desire to return I try to stay away from
using absolute words like best and worst
because it means that something is
either a hundred percent correct or a
hundred percent wrong but honestly
speaking I have only discovered one
country that truly has it all and that
country is the Philippines
[Music]
when it comes to natural beauty you have
7,000 641 islands to choose from with
unlimited beaches high waving coconut
trees and active volcanoes when it comes
to friendliness you will hardly ever
meet a dishonest or rude Filipino they
are always so happy so smiley and so
welcoming when it comes to safety
you will be fine as long as you take
normal precautions whatever you've heard
on the news about the Philippines being
unsafe is false and you can always stay
well connected with a cheap SIM card
when it comes to food you might get
overwhelmed by all the choices for
starters try sinigang the hot and sour
stew with local vegetables and top it
off with hollow hollow the dessert with
shaved ice coconut jelly and fruit I can
tell you with certainty that the
Philippines lives up to its punch line
of its more fun in the Philippines I
suggest you to go there and see what
it's like for yourself
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
